name: RETRO (Thomas Ling)
description:
Created in Twine, and my first small-team game jam game.

When a night at the arcade takes a turn for the worst, you're left with one decision: Survive.

Sneak your way through the arcade, find items scattered about, and try to escape with your life.

Made in collaboration with bunnybomber88 for Untitled Game Jam #12.
